Description:
A Stunning Setting - Ready for you to build your dream home!
If you’re looking for land on the Bellarine Peninsula, look no further than this large block of land approximately 884m2. Its elevated North facing positions provide opportunities for enchanting views over Port Phillip Bay, the You Yangs and beyond to the Melbourne Skyline.
Located in the stunning ‘Baywater Estate’ – you can build your dream home and be only a short stroll to the foreshore and the beach! A pedestrian boardwalk provides easy access to the beach from the top of the cliff. The boat harbour is less than a km away and offers a family friendly playground plus a viewing platform. The Foreshore Park and attractions are already proving popular with local families and visitors. Extensive areas of open space and parkland are also provided along Griggs Creek.
Your new home or holiday sanctuary is within walking distance to shops, schools, parks and the Bay. Well connected to the charming township of nearby Drysdale and its host of established community services and networks will have you feel at home in no time!
Curlewis is set to become one of the most sought – after new addresses on the Bellarine Peninsula. Perfectly positioned, you’ll never want to leave.
For more information, be sure to enquire today!
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Prestigious Bellarine Peninsula - World Class Panoramic Bay Views to You Yangs - On The Edge Of Residential Curlewis
'Scarborough House'
• 142 Acres (57.46Ha) of elevated undulating productive country, 3 road frontages and Rail trail frontage, adjacent Curlewis Golf Club.
• Magnificent two storey homestead, 4 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms, Study, lift, formal lounge and dinning rooms, theatre room,
substantial indoor and outdoor entertaining areas, In ground pool & Spa, in established park land setting.
• Garaging and large shedding.
• Securely watered by town water connected, dam and rain water storage.
Scarborough House one of Geelongs district finest lifestyle and land bank investments.
Situated in the blue ribbon heart of the prestigious Bellarine Peninsula, in a tightly held and capital appreciating region.
10 Mins Ocean Grove (Surf Beach), 15 Mins Queenscliff (Ferry Service),
15 Mins Geelong, 30 Mins Avalon Airport, 60 Mins Melbourne CBD and International Airport.

Description:
Wallington At Its Best!
Here is your chance to embrace charming country living over 13.5 acres (approx.)! Featuring a spacious family abode and quality horse facilities including a sand dressage arena, this property is the ultimate choice for devoted horse-owners or those who are yearning for a relaxed, rural lifestyle.
With the Bellarine Peninsula at your fingertips, every weekend will feel like a holiday - treat yourself to a hit of golf at the Curlewis Golf Club, let the kids run wild at Adventure Park, or explore the regions finest wineries. Terrific access to Ocean Grove, Leopolds Gateway Plaza and the Wallington Primary School is a huge plus, while nearby public transport makes for an easy commute into the Geelong CBD.
Showcasing updates throughout, the home is ready for you to move in and enjoy. Square-set ceilings and white interiors create an airy ambience, while large windows allow the green paddocks to create a picturesque backdrop.
The open plan living zone and generous sheltered alfresco with café blinds provide an array of entertaining options no matter the season. Throw open the kitchen window to serve food straight into the alfresco, lay the table for a family feast in the warm summer air, or snuggle up to wood fire with a glass of red on a cold winters night.
The sleek kitchen is graced with stone benchtops, soft-close drawers, and a large walk-in pantry. Cooking enthusiasts will be in their element with stainless steel appliances including a F&P dishwasher and Omega 900mm oven, gas hob, and rangehood.
The generous Master BR boasts mirrored built-in robes, a walk-in robe, and lush en suite with open shower and ample storage.
Bedroom 2 features built-in robes and access to the enclosed patio, while two additional bedrooms (one with mirrored built-in robes) share close access to the main bathroom. Complete with an open shower and spa bath, the bathroom is a slice of heaven. A study overlooks the front paddock, while the laundry features plentiful storage and external access.
A split system heating and cooling unit provides additional comfort.
The remote double lock-up garage features internal access and powder room access.
With such a generous parcel of land on offer, this property offers oh-so-much potential. A large veggie box and an array of fruit trees will be a hit with green thumbs, while the dog enclosure (with three separate pens) offers versatility as a cattery. However, its the horse facilities that make this property a standout. Five horse paddocks are complete with horse shelters and concrete automatic troughs, with one paddock featuring stallion-mating facilities. Two solid brick stables (built for Clydesdales), a large tack room with basin and separate toilet, hay shed, and float shed are all under the one roof. With the hay shed and float shed boasting lock-up roller doors, this is also a great place to store caravans, trailers, or boats. The professionally built sand dressage arena (20mx60m approx.) proves that quality is paramount in this property. A horse wash bay and rainwater tank with pump add the finishing touches to this exceptional layout. Three additional paddocks offer immense versatility, with the front paddock boasting a dam.
So what are you waiting for? Inspect without delay!

Description:
Lot 811- Stage 8 Coriyule Estate
This allotment measures 490m2 and has a 14m frontage. Now pre-selling with Titles expected late 2017. The Coriyule Estate Curlewis is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to Portarlington Ferry Service, beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that this wonderful area has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also right on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. Our estate gives you the freedom to create without the frustrating restrictions developers often place on the new estates. The National Broadband Network (NBN) is in the Coriyule Estate to provide you with highest quality internet experience. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes if this allotment isn't for you. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
Brand New Home
Brilliantly designed and meticulously finished, this brand new home will appeal to those looking for a new quality property without the hassles of building. This boutique builder is presenting to market a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with double garage and landscaped surrounds within a short walk to the shopping centre and public transport in Curlewis. With quality fixtures and fittings including stone bench tops, security intercom, 9 foot ceilings, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, plenty of storage and a low maintenance design, this property will meet the requirements of the most fastidious purchaser looking for a brilliant Curlewis position. As this house has never been occupied, it will attract all available new home builder incentives for those who meet the criteria.

Description:
Unbeatable Bay Views And Rural Serenity
Sweeping bay views from Geelong to Melbourne's CBD can belong exclusively to you from this optimum hilltop position. This elegant 5 bedroom family home, 'North Hill Farm', offers unimpeded water views and every luxury a family could need on 15.5 acres approx. Interior features are in keeping with the Georgian-style of the abode, with replica period features, French doors, double-hung windows, open fire place and polished floorboards.
Capitalising on the spectacular views, the bright and light-filled open plan kitchen and dining area showcases both bay and pool views, while the cosy lounge room frames the You Yangs, which can be savoured in front of an open fire. Entertaining potential is unbounded with the generous kitchen featuring electric cook top, wall oven, dishwasher, walk-in pantry and island bench top. The outside entertaining area flows seamlessly into the dining/kitchen through classical French doors. Slab heating, ceiling fans and RC-AC provide the home with year round comfort.
One commodious bedroom with BIR is situated on the first floor, with a powder room close by, could easily double as a study. The remaining 3 bedrooms all with BIRs, are located upstairs close to the opulent family bathroom that features spa bath, shower, large vanity and laundry chute. Wake up to magnificent bay views in the master bedroom, along with a private en suite and walk in robe.
The residence also features a spacious 1 bed, 1 bath self-contained barn/guest house with massive games room, kitchenette, and RC-AC that is perfect for teens or guests. Outdoor additions include tennis court, solar heated, salt-chlorinated swimming pool, expansive gardens with underground water tanks, and double lock up garage with power. Well established for horses, with tack room with water and power, 6 large paddocks, 4 with access to horse shelters, 2 day yards and an Olympic sized riding arena with viewing shelter.
Geelong is just 20 minutes drive away and 90 minutes to Melbourne, with the Bellarine Peninsula's gorgeous beaches and wineries on your doorstep. For unbeatable bay views and every luxury a family could desire, you can't get any better than North Hill Farm.
Insights: 32-40 Pax Parade, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
CURLEWIS THE PLACE TO CHOOSE
Now is the time to grow your portfolio with this great opportunity to secure this property. Less than 5 years old the home consists of four bedrooms three with built in robes. Master bedroom complete with walk in robe and ensuite.
Open plan lounge, meals and kitchen area offering a great space for the family along with a separate lounge for keeping all the family occupied. The kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, gas hot plates and electric oven. Central heating and cooling throughout. A double garage completes the property with access internally to the property together with a single door drive through to the rear of the property. Currently leased at $365 per week by great tenants, this property would make the perfect investment to start or add to your existing portfolio. The current tenants have indicated that they would prefer not to move so are happy to stay. Why would you choose to live in Curlewis? A well-presented and maintained property, located in the new Curlewis Estate just 500m from Bayview Central Curlewis Shopping Centre, walking distance to a local primary school, boat ramp for the fisherman, golf course for the golfer. Lifestyle choices here are abundant, cafes, restaurants, bike trails, sporting groups etc. coupled with medical centres, schools and daily shopping and you have all you need.

Description:
Family home in great location
Located just across the road from Morris Park, this 4 years old house is the perfect choice for large families, couples and investors. Comes with 4 bedrooms, the master has a generous walk in robe and ensuite. The three bedrooms are conveniently located for parental supervision and they all have built in wardrobes. By the entrance there is a tiled room that can be utilized as a studio or working room, with water connections and plumbing in place. The open plan kitchen faces the dining and living area, overlooking the patio through large sliding doors. The garden requires easy maintenance with room for more plants. The deck represents a perfect place for outdoor dining and week-end barbecues. The backyard is fenced for complete privacy and is ideal for kids to play safely or pets. Suitable to everyone with all the right features in the right places.

Description:
Lot 823- Coriyule Estate
UNDER CONTRACT. This allotment measures 525m2 and has a 15m frontage. The Coriyule Estate Curlewis is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to Portarlington Ferry Service, beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that this wonderful area has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also right on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. Our estate gives you the freedom to create without the frustrating restrictions developers often place on the new estates. The National Broadband Network (NBN) is in the Coriyule Estate to provide you with highest quality internet experience. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes if this allotment isn't for you. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
PRIME DEVELOPMENT LOCATION (STCA)
With both 1 and 3 Centennial Boulevard available and totalling 958m2 approx of land this prime location is ripe for the picking. Zoned Res 1 with future uses including but not limited to Bed and Breakfast, Medical Centre, Car wash, Place of Worship, Aged Care Facility, Accommodation, Restaurant, Convenience Store, Leisure and Recreation facility all STCA. Ideally located at the entry point to Curlewis Parks Estate, the new Woolworths Shopping Centre and also cornering Jetty Road which is the main arterial into Clifton Springs these blocks are your opportunity to make it BIG!

Description:
Ripe for the Picking!
Here is your opportunity to secure prime real estate in the stunning bayside location of Curlewis on the Bellarine peninsula.
This vacant land at 448m2 with a 14m frontage is titled, ready for the lucky buyer to build their dream home within approx. 150m of Bayview Central shopping centre.
A central location on the Bellarine Peninsula surrounded by some of the regions finest wineries and within 20 minutes drive to Geelong.

Description:
BE SURPRISED WITH THIS WELL DESIGNED, PERFECT HOME!
Set in the new area of Curlewis, close to schools, the jetty and new shopping complex. This 2014 JG King built home will delight with so many extras- top class. Generous proportions throughout a big open space which includes living, fantastic kitchen and dining opening to the undercover entertaining space, second flexible room for theatre or lounge. Four bedrooms or 3 and a study; the master has WIR and ensuite, other three all with BIR'S, central bathroom, large laundry and separate toilet. Features include high ceilings, central heating/airconditioning (zoned), fans, dishwasher, s/s upright stove, double glaze, stone benches, walk in pantry and quality fittings and furnishings. The landscaped garden is easy to maintain and can be added to easily if you wish, double garage with internal access and door to rear yard . A great home where you can live as you wish, designed for flexible use, a real winner.
Insights: 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Once in a lifetime opportunity.
This once in a lifetime opportunity presents itself to secure one of the finest and last remaining acreage allotments in Curlewis’s most sought after street.
Consisting of 5 acres, 81-89 Avila Road is the perfect blank canvas for the discerning buyer who will fully appreciate this opportunity to capitalise on this property's unique position offering an exquisite lifestyle.
The well cleared block provides peace and tranquillity so you can escape to serene lush surroundings, punctuated by the sounds of colourful birdlife and the access to a pristine bay beach is within 5 minutes walk.
To find such quality land in a location that’s just 3 km’s from the Curlewis Shopping Precinct and 5 km’s to the Drysdale Township, world class wineries and restaurants at your doorstep and all the lifestyle options the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, don't miss your opportunity to build and move into this exclusive acreage suburb.

Description:
Build your dream
With 586 sqm this is one of the last good sized blocks ready to build on today. Fully fenced, fairly level this should suit most house designs. Opposite the large Centennial Boulevard adventure parkland, offering plenty of space to
The 18.5 metre frontage could allow side access to the rear yard for a caravan and/or boat.
Located amongst quality homes close to the Curlewis Shopping Centre. The Bunnings & Kmart shopping complex is just 10 minutes down the road. Easy access to the Jetty Road sheltered boat harbour & ramp.
Titled land ready to build on.

Description:
Unique Light Filled Waterfront Residence
Unique light filled waterfront residence architecturally designed to capture sweeping 180 degree water views from city of Melbourne to city of Geelong and stunning indoor/outdoor garden vista. Features 3.2 metre floor to ceiling sliding windows opening to N/W facing terrace with infinity pool, N/S championship tennis court, access to North facing beach, and separate self-contained accommodation. Land size 2 hectares with 2 street frontages.
Comprises huge open plan kitchen meals area and informal sitting room, formal lounge, study, 4 bedrooms, 2 ensuite bathrooms, 2 main bathrooms, hydronic floor heating, reverse cycle air conditioning, 3 car lock up garage, and CBUS security.
Insights: 60 Avila Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.
